text: Gurdeep Roy (born 26 January 1949), sometimes credited as Roy Deep, Gordeep Roy, or just Deep Roy, is a Kenyan-born English movie and voice actor, stuntman and puppeteer.New York Times He has appeared in 50 movies including Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Big Fish, Planet of the Apes, Star Trek, Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen, Mafia!, How the Grinch Stole Christmas, Corpse Bride, and in Star Trek. Roy is also known for his small-size. Roy was born in Nairobi, Kenya on 26 January 1949. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English voice actors Category:People from Nairobi
title: Deep Roy
